name: REVISION_HISTORY_ITEM
title: REVISION_HISTORY_ITEM
description: An entry in a revision history, corresponding to a version from a versioned container. Consists of `AUDIT_DETAILS` instances with revision identifier of the revision to which the `AUDIT_DETAILS` instance belongs.

element.short: An entry in a revision history, corresponding to a version from a versioned container.
element.definition: An entry in a revision history, corresponding to a version from a versioned container. Consists of `AUDIT_DETAILS` instances with revision identifier of the revision to which the `AUDIT_DETAILS` instance belongs.

constraint.human: Audit valid must not be empty

element.short: The audits for this revision; there will always be at least one commit audit (which may itself be an `ATTESTATION`), there may also be further attestations.
element.definition: The audits for this revision; there will always be at least one commit audit (which may itself be an `ATTESTATION`), there may also be further attestations.
